trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Plainfield Township
There were no other sightings in Plainfield Township on or around
divs: Sighting DetailsI was building my house at this time and i am not sure of the date.My best guess is nov.02.IT was real late at night and it was going to frezing rain so I was out covering up my lumber. I looked up and saw this v shaped object float over as it made no noise. It had white lights across its back flashing on and off in order from left to right.It was huge and flying low at low speed to me if was a plane it would have fell out of sky. Every hair on my body stod straight out as I watched this thing fly north out of sight.
Summary: v shaped object with white lights on back blincking on and off from left to right
